title: Darkstream: ignore the title
author: VD
content_html:
I’m almost impressed with the complete disconnect between the title of tonight’s Darkstream and the actual content. On the plus side, there is some dirty economics talk, for those of you who like that sort of thing.

And the term that escaped me was Giffen good, for the record.
content_text:
I’m almost impressed with the complete disconnect between the title of
tonight’s Darkstream
and the actual content. On the plus side, there is some dirty economics talk, for those of you who like that sort of thing.
